job.title: Entry Software Engineer
job.description: Designs, develops, troubleshoots and debugs software programs for software enhancements and new products. Develops software including operating systems, compilers, routers, networks, utilities, databases and Internet-related tools. Determines hardware compatibility and/or influences hardware design.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Codes and programs enhancements, updates, and changes for portions and subsystems of systems software, including operating systems, compliers, networking, utilities, databases, and Internet-related tools</li><li>Executes established test plans and protocols for assigned portions of code; identifies, logs, and debugs assigned issues.</li><li>Develops understanding of and relationship with internal and outsourced development partners on software systems design and development.</li><li>Participates as a member of project team of other software systems engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable, cost effective and high quality solutions for low to moderately- complex products.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education And Experience Required<br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent</li><li>Typically 0-2 years experience<br></li></ul><strong><u>Knowledge And Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience or understanding of software systems design tools and languages.</li><li>Good analytical and problem solving skills.</li><li>Understanding of design for software systems running on multiple platform types</li><li>Understanding of basic testing, coding, and debugging procedures</li><li>Good written and verbal communication skills; mastery in English and local language.<br></li></ul>1097283<br><br>This role has been designated as ‘Edge’, which means you will primarily work outside of an HPE office<br><br>HPE is an equal opportunity employer/Female/Minority/Individual with Disabilities/Protected Veteran Status
